LuxLOL, I really like this Windows but I`m having trouble setting it up in spanish. Also, does it not have .net framework?

Watch a youtube video on how install Windows XP new.
And the .NET Frameworks are not included because this can have conflicts if you install new .NET Framework updates from the Windows Update Center.
Better to install the .NET Frameworks directly for the Windows XP Update Center to aviod this problem.
can i install this on ATA hard disc

Yes you can.
But i always recommend to test it first with VirtualBox to be 100% if the SATA driver is included for your PC.

Hey LuxLOL,

I've been using your Windows XP Black Edition ISOs for about a year now and I've been very happy using them.
When do you plan to do a Windows 7 "Black Edition?" I don't plan to move to Windows 8 as I don't feel comfortable using it.

I also have a suggestion for you: Why not include AIMP into your ISOs? I've found it to be a fantastic music player (I know it can't play videos) and the v3.10 release is as good as ever.

Keep up the good work! :-)
does this have media center ?
Yes it has see the Read Me file (Windows Media Player 11).
I'm still trying to figure out how to change the language. Other than that, excellent (or rather perfect) work ;)
Does this have the "Automatic Updates" enabled? Will I still be able to receive those Windows updates?
Yes. And this is also written in the Read Me file.

This windows install is total bullshit, I tried installing it on my computer onto the hard drive and I had the installer and everything on my flash drive, and WITHOUT ANY FUCKING WARNING this damn thing erased everything on my flash drive and started installing this bullshit on my flash drive before I could even get to a screen to pick where I want to install it!!!

Not only that, I tried using the update windows choice on the installer while on my current operating system and it did whatever the fuck it did, and now windows on the damn computer wont even start at all, and when I do turn it on, it says there are files in the i386 folder and it cant continue and not my computer just sits there and loops on this crap..

If you do a flash installation and you never done it before then you should first read some tutorials or watch some youtube videos on how you do a Windows XP flash installation with the WinToFlash tool or with every other flash tool you like to use.

And i explicitly said in the Read Me file to test everthing first in VirtualBox before doing a live installation.
